text:
RT @ConsumerLondon: So let me get this right....

@thameswater have to self-declare pollution situations and will be fined by @EnvAgency af‚Ä¶

@ashsmith43 @IanBarrettSW @EnvAgency @KenGoodwinITV Has the EnvAgency tested for PBDEs in the sewage discharge?  As virtually all of the fish in Europe (including the UK) have PBDE in them from, they can hardly claim "no evidence of pollution".

Curious as to why @10DowningStreet are putting up with all of this. T‚Ä¶
